content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see you are a student, right? I can offer you the apartment for 700 Euro per month. That's a pretty good deal for a student.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not offering a deal for students. I am offering a high-quality apartment in the city center.
